projects.name: Quizz
projects.description: Quizz is a real-time quizzing application much like Kahoot. I built this project as a fun way to develop my skills using websockets. It uses a packet system for real-time communication, featuring a scoring system, quiz editor, and an easy way to join quizzes.

projects.name: PersonalWebsite V2
projects.description: This second iteration of my personal website features a new design. It now uses multiple pages to split content and make it easer to manage website flow. I can now easily add new content to the site and iterate on design and features.

projects.name: Illuzionz Studios Design System
projects.description: This is a React based design system that allows you to use skeleton components to easily and consistently build UIs. Built on styled-components, it makes it very easy to customise and use.
